findings.context: Dark mode: --text-tertiary (neutral-500 #78716c) on --surface-primary (neutral-950 #0c0a09). Used in footer copyright, filter labels, metadata text.
findings.recommendation: Change dark mode --text-tertiary to neutral-400 (#a8a29e) for 5.92:1 ratio.

findings.context: Light mode: white text on bg-brand-600 (#0d9488). This affects all primary buttons and the 'Browse Registry' CTA. The Sign In button in the header also uses this combination.
findings.recommendation: Darken the brand button background to brand-700 (#0f766e) for 4.56:1 ratio, or use brand-800 (#115e59) for 6.28:1.

findings.context: Dark mode: The homepage CTA link uses bg-brand-600 text-white directly (not the Button component which uses dark:bg-brand-500 dark:text-neutral-950). This means the homepage buttons are inconsistent with the Button component in dark mode.
findings.recommendation: Align homepage CTA links to use Button component classes. The Button component correctly uses dark:text-neutral-950 on dark:bg-brand-500.

findings.context: Light mode: neutral-500 on neutral-50 barely passes WCAG AA (4.59:1 vs 4.5:1 threshold). Fails AAA (7:1). Acceptable but borderline.
findings.recommendation: No immediate action needed. Monitor if design spec demands AAA compliance.
